lead_paragraph: Some in Iran disputed reports that Ali Shakorirad had been arrested hours after he held a news conference thanking President Hassan Rouhani for a more open political climate.

headline.main: Reformist Iranian Politician Is Said to Be Held
headline.print_headline: Reformist Iranian Politician Is Said to Be Held

snippet: Some in Iran disputed reports that Ali Shakorirad had been arrested hours after he held a news conference thanking President Hassan Rouhani for a more open political climate.
